title: The Future of Self Custody with Ian Rogers of Ledger
description: Ian Rogers, the Chief Experience Officer at Ledger, joins Kevin Rose to discuss the current state of security and self custody of blockchain assets and the future of self custody and smoothing over the current problems with NFT and crypto security.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: Ian Rogers, the Chief Experience Officer at Ledger, joins Kevin Rose to discuss the current state of security and self custody of blockchain assets and the future of self custody and smoothing over the current problems with NFT and crypto security.
